DataElement.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._A condition or state at a particular time._The state of the study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/19/10 released per VCDE request post Silver Review

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Exerting influence or producing an effect.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates an absence of a measurable amount of a specific function or role performed by a biological entity in a Biophysical Process, Biochemical Reaction, or Biochemical Process.

Concepts.definition: Indicates an absence of a measurable amount of a specific function or role performed by a biological entity in a biophysical process, biochemical reaction, or biochemical process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 4/10/10 released as part of Labviewer model content release task.
